# llms.txt - Information for AI/LLM Crawlers
# This file provides context about the website for AI language models

# Site Information
Site: https://robinthomasonline.github.io
Owner: Robin Thomas
Type: Personal Portfolio & Web Applications Showcase
Language: English

# About
Robin Thomas is an IT & Cybersecurity Consultant, DevOps & Cloud Specialist, and GRC & Compliance Expert with 9+ years of experience. 
Specializes in infrastructure, network security, cloud solutions, and compliance (PCI DSS, ISO 27001).
Founder of Opsbin (IT Support Services) and Bitstrail (Software Development Company).

# Main Sections
- Home: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/
- About: Professional background and story
- Expertise: IT Security, DevOps, Cloud, GRC, Project Management, Web & Mobile Development
- Experience: Career timeline and work history
- Startups: Opsbin and Bitstrail business information
- Apps: Portfolio of web applications and tools
- Contact: Contact information and social media links

# Web Applications
The site hosts several free web applications:

1. Work Timer - Productivity timer for tracking work sessions
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/timer/

2. Mood Logger - Track emotional wellbeing and mood patterns
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/mood/

3. Password Generator - Generate secure, compliant passwords
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/password/

4. Subnet Calculator - Network engineering tool for subnet calculations
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/subnet/

5. IP Address Locator - IP geolocation and network information tool
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/ip/

6. Kanban Board - Drag-and-drop task management board
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/kanban/

7. Kerala Lottery Draw Machine - Lottery simulator
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/keralalottery/

8. Resume & Cover Letter Generator - AI-powered ATS-friendly resume and cover letter generator
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/resume-cover/

9. Co-Founder Pie - Calculate fair equity distribution for startup co-founders
   URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/cofounder-pie/

10. Daybook - Track income and expenses for small shops with invoice generation
    URL: https://robinthomasonline.github.io/apps/daybook/
